title: Ticket #5653: Add per-splice DAG throttling
description:
As per discussion with Miron -- he would like the capability to have maxjobs, maxidle, maxpre, and maxpost settings that apply per splice (basically the way they work for a sub-DAG).

I have to think about the right way to do this -- one way to do the maxjobs would be to automatically create a node category for everything in the splice. That wouldn't help with the other things, though.

Hmm -- now that I think about it, maybe the way to do it is to have a Dag object for the splice (attached to the PRE splice node?). If we did that, though, we'd have to do something special to have throttles that applied across splices.
remarks:
2016-Nov-06 21:21:52 by wenger:
The new ALL_NODES feature should pretty much give us this for maxjobs -- you can do this: 

  # Within the splice DAG file
  CATEGORY ALL_NODES my_cat
  MAXJOBS my_cat 5

but for maxpre, maxpost, and maxidle this doesn't do any good.
